column5: Fishing SUCKED  Decided I needed a break from everything and went down to Long Point by myself today. It is the first time I have managed to get out this year.  It was a BEAUTIFUL day, for the first couple hours I had my snow suit off and swear I got a tan.    Today was also the first time I got to take the 4 wheeler out on the ice, She went through everything just fine    Not long after I got all set up my first fish of 2011 came up, what a monster lol    I had steady action for a bit but nothing big    After a bit I got sick of the noise of everyone and went off to find a quiet part of the bay, I had a good feeling I would get nothing there but was it ever peaceful!    I set up my trusty rod holder and almost fell asleep        On my way back in I was stopped by the OPP who were out and about.  Hoping I can get out again next weekend.
Hey can't complain about that man!  Thanks for sharing, MTBF
Catching fish is part of it Dan, but getting out is the other part. Thanks for sharing
Great report and pics Dan You did better than me today.... you went fishing Leechman
You got out and caught some fish  What more can you ask for, it was a great day weather wise.
Sometimes that peace and quiet is sooo nice. Enjoy it.
Nice stuff Dan!! Good to see you got out ! I was in and out of Cambridge tonight.... I should find out where you live so I can drop by.. eat your catch.. drink you beer and flirt with your wife!
No prob, go straight out the driveway from the townhouse and I'm 500' up the street!  BTW - I'm out of beer but my wife will be home
It was a very last minute thing, let's get a couple guys together and rent a hut for a day
Looks a beautiful day on the ice Dan.
